thread.title: The best party cities in the world
thread.title_full: The best party cities in the world

author: Telegraph Staff
title: The best party cities in the world
text:
Horses for courses, sure. But when it comes to nightlife, these cities stand out, regardless of whether you’re into pubs, clubs, bars, jazz shows, street festivals, late-night lock-ins or early-morning walks home. 
By Hugh Morris 
London, England 
The capital does not have a catchy moniker like New York’s City That Never Sleeps, but there’s no doubt of its muscle when it comes to a night out. From the trendy outposts of Hackney to the familiar glitz of the West End and beyond, there is a wealth of world-famous clubs (Fabric, anyone?), cocktail bars, rooftop terraces and historical pubs in between. Our London expert, Sophie Campbell says : “The range of restaurants, bars, theatres, sports, pop-ups, performance art and large-scale events is astounding. Right here, right now, London is somewhere you have to be.” Picture: Getty
